I'm not planning to make a converter at the moment as they're two different systems. It would be possible to create a crude converter I suppose but you'd still have quite a bit of manual converting and testing to do.

You'll be able to play Quest 4.x games within Quest 5 - one conceivable option might be to make some small enhancements to ASL4 to allow it to specify the HTML interface file to be used within Quest 5.
